Uses of Package
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di

Packages that use com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop Provides the classes necessary for aspect-oriented programming. 
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context Provides the classes necessary for configuring Infinitum and providing application-wide access to configuration information. 
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di Provides the classes necessary for performing dependency injection. 
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di.impl Provides concrete implementations for the DI framework. 
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.internal Provides internal utility classes. 
 

Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop
BeanComponent
           Encapsulates the notion of a "bean", which consists of a name or ID, a class, and optional properties.
 

Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context
BeanFactory
           Stores beans that have been configured in infinitum.cfg.xml.
 

Classes in com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di used by com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di
AbstractBeanDefinition
           Describes a bean instance, including its name, type, property values, and constructor arguments.
ActivityInjector.Event
          Defines the type of input event that occurs on a View.

           Encapsulates the notion of a "bean", which consists of a name or ID, a class, and optional properties.
BeanComponent.Property
           Encapsulates a bean property, which represents a Field inside a bean instance.
BeanDefinitionBuilder
           Provides a means to construct AbstractBeanDefinition instances.
BeanFactory
           Stores beans that have been configured in infinitum.cfg.xml.
